data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Be sure to cross your name out of the ledger completely; you don't want to leave a record of your presence here. We can't have ____ finding ____ that ____ crossed ____ with ____ director ____ week. If ____ does ____ that ____ were ____, ____ could ____ down ____ whole ____. At the very least, we'd have a scandal on our hands.
data.partBlankContent: Be sure to cross your name out of the ledger completely; you don't want to leave a record of your presence here. We can't have any____ finding o__ that y__ crossed pa___ with t__ director th__ week. If some____ does disc____ that y__ were he__, i_ could br___ down t__ whole de__. At the very least, we'd have a scandal on our hands.
data.fullContent: Be sure to cross your name out of the ledger completely; you don't want to leave a record of your presence here. We can't have anybody finding out that you crossed paths with the director this week. If somebody does discover that you were here, it could break down the whole deal. At the very least, we'd have a scandal on our hands.
data.answer: 务必把你的名字从分类帐上完全划掉;你不会想在这里留下你的痕迹的。我们不能让任何人发现你这周和导演有交集。如果有人发现你在这里，整个交易就会泡汤了。至少，我们会有一桩丑闻。
